import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import "./ShoeDetail.css" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function ShoeDetail() { const [shoe, setShoe] = useState({}); const { id } = useParams(); async function loadShoe() { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8080/api/shoe/${id}/`); const data = await response.json(); setShoe(data); } useEffect(() => { loadShoe(); }, []); const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1; return (

Product

{shoe.name}

{shoe.description}

Details

Brand

{shoe.brand}

Category

{shoe.category}

Price

{shoe.price}

Size

{shoe.size}

Color

{shoe.color}

Sku

{shoe.sku}

Gender

{shoe.gender}

); } export default ShoeDetail;
